name: WarWar Battle Kingdom
description:
An exciting strategy game where warriors fight against each other on a field of cages. You have to place the heroes of your troops in different lanes so that they defeat the enemies and go to the finish line with the maximum number of soldiers. At the beginning of each round, you can choose different heroes and distribute them into lanes. Each hero has unique abilities, strength, magic and dexterity. The correct placement of heroes will depend on the strategy you choose and on the characteristics of each hero.
The main goal of the game is to defeat the enemy and destroy his troops before he does it to yours. Winning is achieved by those who can lead their warriors to the finish line, inflicting maximum losses on the enemy. However, you should be careful, as the enemies will do their best to stop your progress.
